body.name: Smart Watch for Men(Answer/Make Call),1.43" AMOLED Rugged Smartwatch,120 Sport Modes,5ATM Waterproof,Heart Rate Monitor/Sleep Monitor/SpO2/Blood Pressure,Military Fitness Tracker for Android/iOS Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 40 mins
features: 🏆【1.43'' AMOLED HD Touchscreen】The durable smart watch for men launched by SUNKTA in 2023 features a high-resolution 1.43'' AMOLED touchscreen with a resolution of 466*466. This touhscreen not only provides clear content display, smooth operation, and visual experiences but also enables the use of an extremely energy-efficient Always-On Display function, where the screen remains constantly on (analog clock or digital time).

🏆【Bluetooth Calling & Smart Notifications】This men's smart watch is equipped with a high-quality speaker and microphone for clearer sound and smoother calls. The smartwatch can receive calls, messages, and notifications from applications such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, and more. Each time a notification is received, the watch vibrates to alert you, ensuring you don't miss any important calls or messages.

🏆【400mAh Battery & 5ATM Waterproof】The military smart watch for men is equipped with a built-in 400mAh high-performance battery, providing an exceptionally long battery life. With just 2 hours of charging time, it can be used for 7-10 days, and in standby mode, the watch can last up to 30 days. It features 5ATM waterproof, shockproof, and dustproof capabilities, making it a reliable companion for sports and adventures in both rainy and humid environments!

🏆【24/7 Health Tracker】This stylish smartwatch for men features a 24-hour monitoring function that provides real-time measurements of heart rate, sleep, calories, SpO2, and blood pressure. It also offers data records for 7 to 30 days, allowing you to track your health metrics and gain a quicker understanding of your overall physical well-being.

🏆【120+ Sport Modes Smartwatch and Activity Tracker】This men's outdoor smart watch features over 120 different sports modes, including running, hiking, cycling, long jump, skiing, basketball, jump rope, and various other fitness modes. Built-in biometric sensors measure data such as heart rate, distance, calories burned, and training time during exercise.

🏆【Multifunctional Bluetooth Smartwatch】This durable smartwatch not only offers Bluetooth calling and health monitoring features but also comes equipped with a variety of practical functions, including AI voice assistant, music playback, weather forecast, calculator, alarm clock, timer, stopwatch, remote trigger, phone finder, and more. With this smartwatch, your life will become even more convenient.

🏆【SUNKTA Smartwatch with 12-Month Warranty】This exquisite smartwatch for men boasts broad compatibility, suitable for Android systems 4.4 or higher and iOS systems 8.0 or higher. The SUNKTA smartwatch comes with a 12-month free warranty service. If you encounter any issues after receiving the product, please contact us. We will provide you with a satisfactory response within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUNKTA 1.43'' AMOLED Men's Smartwatch - Sturdy & Durable SUNKTA Military Grade Men's Smart watch - Crafted from special metal materials and H7 glass, the overall casing is scratch-resistant and durable. It has passed numerous standard tests, including temperature, impact, low-pressure high-altitude, dust, and liquid contamination tests, providing effective protection for the smart watch. The 5ATM waterproof capability allows the smartwatch to be used in rain, humidity, sweat, and other environments without worries.AMOLED Touchscreen - This touchscreen provides you with ultra-clear image quality and a smooth user experience. It can continuously display the time (digital/analog), and showing the time in touchscreen saver mode allows you to check the time instantly anytime, anywhere, which is extremely convenient.Multifunctional Smart watch - These exquisite men's watches not only offer Bluetooth calls, notifications, and other communication features but also provide health and sports modes. Additionally, they come with practical daily functions such as a calculator, stopwatch, and more. Discover it now! *Package Contents: 1 Watch, 2 Straps (Stainless Steel Strap + Silicone Strap), Bracelet Adjuster, Smartwatch Charging Cable

Stable Bluetooth Communication Function This practical smart watch features built-in speakers and microphones, providing you with stable and clear call quality. Normal communication is possible within a range of 10 meters. Even when the smartphone is not nearby, you won't miss any important calls. Furthermore, it supports the use of AI-driven intelligent voice assistants and direct playback of music on the smartwatch, making it highly functional, like a mini speaker. Can store 10 contacts, one-key speed dialNumeric keypadBrowse call listsIntelligently receive notifications from the smartphone with vibration alert, supporting apps such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, SMS, WhatsApp, email, WeChat, and other applications. *The Men's Smart watch supports Bluetooth version 5.0 and is compatible with Android smartphones from version 4.4 and above, as well as iOS from version 8.0.

Your Personal Health Companion! The smartwatch features a built-in biosensor on the back that measures your health data through skin contact. With this smartwatch, you can digitize your health data and record it in charts and statistics to learn more about your health condition. 24-Hour Heart Rate Tracking: Supports continuous monitoring of heart rate. You can set specific thresholds in the "FitCloudPro" app, and when reached, you will be alerted through vibration to pay attention to your health status.Intelligent Sleep Analysis: Intelligently logs your sleep time and analyzes your sleep quality (deep sleep, light sleep).Real-time Blood Pressure/Blood Oxygen Data: Quickly measure your current blood oxygen or blood pressure level with just one button press. *Cannot replace medical devices.

100+ Sport Modes, Enjoy the Pleasure of Movement! Integrating over 100 different training modes to meet your diverse fitness needs. The smartwatch intelligently records your workout time, distance covered, step count, calories burned, etc. The data syncs with your phone, making it easier for you to analyze the results of your physical activities and plan a more scientific approach to your fitness lifestyle. *Running, Climbing, Cycling, Hiking, Skiing, Basketball, Volleyball, Soccer, Jump Rope, Golf, Long Jump, Fitness, Yoga, and many other sport modes.

Multifunctional Smartwatch The smartwatch features various practical functions. By pressing the button, you can access the functional page and use these handy tools. Always-on Display (Digital Time, Analog Time)Call Function & NotificationsReal-time Blood Pressure/Blood Oxygen Data24-Hour Heart Rate Monitoring/Sleep MonitoringWeather ForecastArtificial Intelligence Voice AssistantStep CounterMusic PlayerBreathing Exercises/Movement Reminder/Drink ReminderStopwatch/TimerAlarm/CalculatorPassword LockFind Phone/Find Smartwatch

400mAh Battery Capacity This rugged men's smartwatch utilizes a 400mAh large battery that can be charged in 2 hours, providing a usage time of 5-10 days. With low usage frequency, the battery can last approximately 20 days. The charger is small and easy to carry. It charges through magnetic attraction on the back of the watch, making it extremely convenient and secure.

Over 200 Exquisitely Designed User Interfaces to Choose From. There are 7 classic local user interfaces.The dial market in the "FitCloudPro" app gives you access to up to 200 cool dials that you can use.You can sync your favorite photos as a dial and customize your preferred dial individually.There are 2 always-visible time displays (can be activated in the smartwatch settings).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Haven't had to charge it yet
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. Lots of features. Got it and started wearing it on a Wednesday afternoon after fully charging it. It is now the Saturday of the following week, and it still has a 60% charge. Connects to my Android phone by Bluetooth so I can take calls and read messages etc. It's not like the Samsung watch I had, that had its own phone number, and I didn't have to have the phone with me. This is a Bluetooth connection, so the phone has to be nearby. Great watch though. Especially for what it cost. It comes with 2 straps and the tool for removing links on the metal band.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The great thing about this watch for people like me with small wrists is that it comes with a tool that lets you adjust the size of the steel bracelet strap (there is also a rubber strap but they irritate my skin). The watch itself is easy to read and view things like texts, emails etc. Functions like Oxygen saturation, Pulse and BP work flawlessly (although only use these for reference). You can change the display watch face easily. Mine had 2 watch faces installed but equally easy to choose a different one from the App for this watch. I like how easy it is to charge as well with magnetic attachment which stops you attaching it the wrong way. I did have a problem with the weather but found the answer on the FAQ on the App.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice smartwatch. And let them know if there is a problem . They take action when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a great watch with some novel functions. Thoroughly happy with the price and product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent battery and robust. Is waterproof. Very easy to use and has all the features except for the pay options but for a quality watch like this for the price you can't complain.
